text: Through no fault of their own, hundreds of thousands of Floridians are having difficulty making ends meet. I’m pleased to announce that @Florida_Housing has approved $75 million to distribute to counties for rental and mortgage assistance. Info here – https://t.co/VvbuwCqWf9 https://t.co/o1kzob40jI
